name: Gaxsys US
overview:
gaxsys developed and markets an e-commerce technology that utilizes a proprietary exchange mechanism to turn the brand-retailer-consumer online ecosystem into a fully automated, efficient and streamlined, turnkey e-commerce solution. Using the Gaxsys system, brands integrate retailers into the brandâ€™s eCommerce by using them as “mini warehouses” to facilitate the sales cycle. Gaxsys US is subsidiary of gaxsys GmbH.

gaxsys GmbH was founded in Karlsruhe, Germany, in the summer of 2008. Its idea: to show brand manufacturers how to organize e-commerce together with their authorized retailers. Using the g.a.x.-system, brand manufacturersâ€™ webshops are for the first time linked online with their authorized retailers and consumers. gaxsys GmbHâ€™s prime objective is to arrange the purchase and sale of branded products via the Internet in an easy and effective manner. With intelligent e-commerce technology, gaxsys GmbH brings together what belongs together: brands, retailers and consumers.
